# name

**Instance Property**

The name of the target file.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var name: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property contains the filename without any preceding path information. The default value of this property is derived from the path information in the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDocumentInteractionController/url] property. You can change the value of this property as needed if you want to associate a different name with the file.

## Accessing the target document’s attributes

- **url**: The URL identifying the target file on the local filesystem.
- **uti**: The type of the target file.
- **icons**: The images associated with the target file.
- **annotation**: Custom property list information for the target file.
